required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Results of the Tactys Implant in Proximal Interphalangeal Joint Arthroplasty
clinical_study.official_title: Proximal Interphalangeal Joint Arthroplasty With the TACTYS® Prosthesis : Clinical and Radiographic Results at Medium Term.

brief_summary.textblock: Study at middle term of the functional and radiographic results of proximal interphalangeal joint arthroplasty with the Tactys prothesis. The aim is to evaluate if the short term results are maintained in time.

detailed_description.textblock:
The inclusion criteria is any patient who has undergone a proximal interphalangeal joint arthroplasty with the Tactys prothesis between january 2015 to january 2020 in the Centre Chirurgical Emile Gallé in Nancy.
The functional results evaluated are range of motion, force, pain, functional score as Quick DASH and the radiological one are clinodactyly, periprosthetic ossifications and loosening, dislocation and implant subsidence.
Data is registered from the medical folder of every patient.

primary_outcome.description: measurement of range of motion in degrees
measurement of force with jamar and pinch tests in kilograms

primary_outcome.measure: pain with the digital pain scale
primary_outcome.description: measurement of pain with the digital pain scale to zero to ten

primary_outcome.measure: functional score with the Quick DASH
primary_outcome.description: measurement of the quick-DASH functional score to zeo to hundred

secondary_outcome.measure: register the complication and their apparition in time

secondary_outcome.description: assess the patient's satisfaction : very satisfied, satisfied, moderate, not satisfied

arm_group.arm_group_label: Results at short term follow up
arm_group.description: Functional and Radiological results at short-term follow up (one year at least)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Results at middle term follow up
arm_group.description: Functional and Radiological results at the last follow up of the patient (2 years at least)

intervention.intervention_name: Proximal Interphalangeal Joint Arthroplasty with the Tactys Prosthesis
intervention.arm_group_label: Results at middle term follow up
Results at short term follow up

study_pop.textblock: patients who have undergone a proximal interphalangeal joint arthroplasty with the Tactys prosthesis between january 2015 and january 2020 in the Chirugie de la main service in the Centre chirurgical Emile Gallé in Nancy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- one or more proximal interphalangeal joint arthroplasty of long fingers with the Tactys prosthesis
- between january 2015 to january 2020
- major
- centre chirurgical emile gallé, centre hospitalier régional universitaire de Nancy
Exclusion Criteria:
- minor
